data.title: Michael J. Tomkiewicz
data.meta_description: Mike is a shareholder in GrayRobinsonâ€™s Tallahassee office. His practice is focused on Florida eminent domain and property rights litigation, including the representation of owners and businesses in condemnation actions, inverse condemnation, regulatory takings, Bert J. Harris claims, land use and zoning disputes, as well as real estate related commercial and partnership litigation. He has successfully represented property owners in many difficult and novel cases, at both the trial and appellate levels.
